instructions: On the iPhone home screen, tap the Settings app. Select Siri & Search . Tap the Listen for "Hey Siri" slider to turn it to the On (green) position. Tap the Press Side Button for Siri slider to turn it to the On position. Select My Information and choose your Contact card.

Open the Reminders app and tap the + (plus sign) located to the right of the Search field. Select Reminder . In the Create Reminder screen, enter a title for the reminder. Tap the Remind me on a day slider to turn it to the On position. Then, set a date for the reminder, designate an alarm on that day at a specified time, and select whether to repeat the reminder. Tap the Remind me at a location slider to turn it to the On position. This associates a location with a reminder. When choosing a location, select your Home, Work, or other address associated with a contact entry stored in the Contacts app. After you associate an address with a reminder, tap When I Arrive or When I Leave to generate an alert when you arrive or depart the specified location. The Reminders app uses the GPS feature of your phone to inform you when you arrive or depart a specified location. In the Priority section, tap either ! , !! , or !!! to associate an optional priority to the reminder. The default option is None . The Reminders app does not re-sort items in a list based on priority, it only displays the priority associated with each item. Tap List to associate the reminder with a particular list. Otherwise, the item is placed on the default list. In the Notes section, enter notes related to the item. Use cut and paste to insert content from other apps, such as a photo. Tap Done to save the entry.

Open the Reminders app, tap the + (plus sign), then select List . In the New List field, enter a title for the list. For example, type Grocery List or To-Do List . Tap a colored dot to associate the list with a color. Tap Done to save the empty list. Reopen the list and tap + (plus sign) to create a new entry in the list. Tap an entry to display the Info icon to the right of the listing. Tap Info to access the Details associated with the item. Then, choose a time and date, select a location, add a priority, and enter notes. Tap Done to exit the Details screen. Tap the + (plus sign) that appears after the last entry to enter additional list items. Tap Edit to make changes to the list or reorder the items. Tap Done to save your changes. When you complete an item, tap the circle to the left of the item. To delete an individual list item, swipe from right to left across the listing and tap Delete .
